summary: Provides a GPU‑accelerated implementation of the diagonal (DIA) sparse matrix format, allowing creation from data and offset arrays, efficient access to shape, non‑zero count, elements and specific diagonals, and conversion to dense or other sparse representations within the CuPy ecosystem.
business_intent: Facilitate high‑performance scientific and engineering computations on GPUs by offering an efficient diagonal sparse matrix representation compatible with existing SciPy workflows.
